20110110035357.000|20110110035400.000|TR0|LEMON:  OK.
20110110035400.000|20110110035402.000|TR0|
20110110035402.000|20110110035404.000|TR0|GUPTA:  But what we know now even as 
20110110035404.000|20110110035407.000|TR0|compared to yesterday when you and I last 
20110110035407.000|20110110035409.000|TR0|spoke is that this -- she was actually -- 
20110110035409.000|20110110035411.000|TR0|the bullet entered the back -- the left 
20110110035411.000|20110110035413.000|TR0|side of the head over here, it was the 
20110110035413.000|20110110035416.000|TR0|back, and exited on the same side, left 
20110110035416.000|20110110035418.000|TR0|side near the front.  It did not cross 
20110110035418.000|20110110035420.000|TR0|from left to right.
20110110035420.000|20110110035423.000|TR0|
20110110035423.000|20110110035425.000|TR0|Very important point.  They mentioned that 
20110110035425.000|20110110035427.000|TR0|a couple of times.  It's important because 
20110110035427.000|20110110035430.000|TR0|the likelihood of someone doing well or
